sec.p: For any management action to be considered Climate-Smart, two categories of Climate-Smart Design
How will climate change directly or indirectly affect how the stressor of concern impacts the system?

How will climate change affect the functionality of the management action (through effects on the stressor and/or effects on the action directly), and as a result how will the action need to be adjusted (in terms of location, timing, or engineering design)?
Source: ‘Adaptation Design Tool: Corals & Climate Adaptation Planning’, NOAA Technical Memorandum (Parker et al. 2017); www.coris.noaa.gov/activities/CCAP_design.
